text:
Hello Everyone!

I want to ask if this is possible in HubSpot. See <https://vcbc.org.au/find-a-business/>
If you toggle on the Map on the right side. It will display all the listings on the Map and if you scroll the Map it will display the listings near you.

I will appreciate your help guys.

Thanks,
Johanz
:bulb: HubDB row api addition: itâ€™d be nice to have a `previous` and `next` property returned on the single row call. The response would be the previous and/or next row id
